import React,{useState}from'react';import TimerSetup from'./components/TimerSetup';import TimerDisplay from'./components/TimerDisplay';import'./styles/Timer.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){console.log('App is rendering');// Debug log
